channel.title: Fool Accuses Hunter, Dies to Hunter Passive, Wins
channel.description:
#### What happened? Fool accused the hunter and brought to a vote. Game voted to execute hunter. Fool is killed by the Hunter's passive. Hunter is executed. "Fool has been executed" message and we are unable to vote for execution due to Fool "Execution". Fool wins game.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Fool accuses Hunter and brought to a vote. Game voted to Execute hunter. Foll is killed by Hunter's passive. Hunter is executed. Game continues on as Fool wasn't executed. Fool loses.
#### Steps to reproduce: 1) Be a Fool, know who a hunter is 2) Initiate vote to accuse hunter 3) Vote succeeds, Hunter is executed 4) Get killed by Hunter passive 5) Win game
#### Comments:
I assume this is unintended as it can allow the Fool to win on his own by just accusing hunter's.
